lead_paragraph: Vietnam may grant U.S. warships access to its ports, and Washington seems certain to widen exceptions to its longtime arms embargo and may end it altogether.

headline.print_headline: Arriving in Vietnam, Obama Aims to Coax It Away From China’s Pull
headline.main: Arriving in Vietnam, Obama Aims to Lure It Away From China

snippet: Vietnam may grant U.S. warships access to its ports, and Washington seems certain to widen exceptions to its longtime arms embargo and may end it altogether.
abstract: Pres Obama arrives in Hanoi, Vietnam, for three days of talks with country's leaders; is hoping to lure country, which relies on China for trade and investment, out from under its influence.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
